# UnseenStream Search Terms
# Targets unintended/accidental uploads with low view counts
# Each line is a search query to find rare, random footage

# Camera/Phone Default Filenames (most common for accidental uploads)
MOV
DSC
IMG
VID
DCIM
MVI
PICT
PIC

# Video File Extensions (people uploading raw files)
mp4
avi
mkv
mov
wmv
flv
m4v
3gp
webm

# Numeric patterns (auto-generated names)
video
clip
recording
footage
capture
screen
film

# Generic/Default names
untitled
test
new
draft
temp
sample
output
render

# Date patterns (YYYYMMDD format - common in camera uploads)
20241109
20241108
20241107
20241106
20241105
20241104
20241103
20241102
20241101
20241031

# Time-based patterns
morning
afternoon
evening
today
yesterday

# Common accidental upload scenarios
gopro
drone
dashcam
security
cctv
webcam
zoom
meeting
stream

# Single letters (catch-all for diverse results)
a
b
c
d
e
f
g
h
i
j
k
l
m
n
o
p
q
r
s
t
u
v
w
x
y
z

# Two-letter combinations (more specific but still broad)
aa
ab
ac
ad
ae
af

# Numbers (sequence videos, tests)
1
2
3
4
5
123
test1
test2
video1
video2

# Regional/Language variations
vídeo
vidéo
視頻
影片
動画
비디오
видео

# Camera brands/models (people don't rename)
canon
nikon
sony
samsung
iphone
android
xiaomi
huawei
gopro
dji

# File transfer artifacts
whatsapp
telegram
messenger
share
send
received
download

# Common typos/lazy titles
asdf
qwerty
zzz
aaa
xxx
test123
